title: Google’s Gemini 3 Release Won Over More Than 100 Million New Active Users
full_text: Google’s Gemini 3 Release Won Over More Than 100 Million New Active Users. Gemini is coming for ChatGPT's crown.. Google’s AI assistant Gemini App now has more than 750 million monthly active users, CEO Sundar Pichai said at parent company Alphabet’s fourth-quarter earnings call. That’s roughly 100 million more… [+2670 chars]
